name: Escape in 10
description:
Welcome to "Escape in 10", a thrilling game where you take on the role of a prisoner who has to escape from a high-security prison before time runs out. You have just 10 seconds to get out of your cell, dodge the patrolling police officers, and make your way to the exit. But be careful, the police are on high alert and will do everything in their power to catch you.

Use your quick reflexes and cunning to avoid the guards, and make your way to freedom. Every second counts, so you'll need to act fast and stay focused if you want to succeed. With challenging gameplay, fast-paced action, and a ticking clock, "Escape in 10" will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

Do you have what it takes to escape in just 10 seconds? Play "Escape in 10" now and find out!

Controls:

W,A,S,D or ↑, ←, ↓, → keys to move

Goal:

Escape each level before 10 seconds

UI:

A clockwise timer will be at top-left of the screen which will show total time left

Note: The game currently have 6 levels (due to time shortage) after that it will playback level 1
